p:
Female nude mice were subcutaneously injected in the underarm area with a suspension of 1×10 7 cells in 200 ul of PBS. The mice were observed 4 weeks before killing and recovery of the tumors. Tumor growth was measured after one week. The formula: Volume (cm 3) = (length × width 2)/2 was used to measured tumor volume. The ethics committee of the second affiliated hospital of zhejiang university have consented the research (Approval No. 2020106,
Supplement Figure2 ). Animal studies were performed in compliance with the ARRIVE guidelines. All animals received humane care according to the National Institutes of Health (USA) guidelines.
